languages.text: "Разрешите и мне выступить, Ваша Светлось!" {n}Гетка Зауэрбэк с пылом кланяется вам.{/n} "Возможность служить на вашем корабле — большая честь для меня и моей семьи. Обвинения крайне серьезные, а потому требуют внимания Вольного Торговца. Если вы решите расследовать случившееся, я буду счастлив оказать вам любую помощь".

traits.locale_text: "Разрешите и мне выступить, Ваша Светлось!" {n}Гетка Зауэрбек с пылом кланяется вам.{/n} "Возможность служить на вашем корабле — большая честь для меня и смоей семьи. Обвинения в заговоре и распространении ереси — крайне серьезные, а потому требуют внимание Вольного Торговца. Если вы решите расследовать случившееся, я буду счастлив оказать вам любую помощь".
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "Kindly allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback offers you an eager bow.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. These charges are grievous indeed and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. Should you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to assist."
languages.original_text: "Разрешите и мне выступить, Ваша Светлось!" {n}Гетка Зауэрбэк с пылом кланяется вам.{/n} "Возможность служить на вашем корабле — большая честь для меня и моей семьи. Обвинения крайне серьезные, а потому требуют внимания Вольного Торговца. Если вы решите расследовать случившееся, я буду счастлив оказать вам любую помощь".

traits.locale_text: "Allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback bows to you zealously.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. The accusations are dire, and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. If you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to help you however I can."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

The accusations are dire and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. Should you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to oblige."

traits.locale_text: "Kindly allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback bows to you zealously.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. The accusations are dire and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. Should you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to oblige."

traits.locale_text: "Kindly allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback offers you an eager bow.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. traits.locale_text: "Kindly allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback offers you an eager bow.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. These charges are grievous indeed and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. Should you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to assist."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: 「私にも発言をお許しください、陛下！」{n}ヘトカ・ザウアーバックがあなたに向かって熱心に頭を下げる。{/n}「陛下の船にお仕えする機会は、私とわが家にとりまして大変光栄です。これらの罪は実に痛ましいものであり、自由開拓者には留意いただきたいのです。万一、陛下が調査の指揮をとられるならば喜んで応じましょう」
languages.original_text: "Kindly allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback offers you an eager bow.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. These charges are grievous indeed and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. Should you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to assist."

traits.locale_text: 「私にも発言をお許しください、陛下！」{n}ヘトカ・ザウアーバックがあなたに向かって熱心に頭を下げる。{/n}「陛下の船にお仕えする機会は、私とわが家にとりまして大変光栄です。これらの罪は実に痛ましいものであり、自由開拓者には留意いただきたいのです。万一、陛下が調査の指揮をとられるならば喜んで応じましょう」
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: “也请允许我说几句，大人！”{n}赫特卡·苏尔贝克殷切地鞠了一躬。{/n}“能在您的飞船上工作，是我本人，也是苏尔贝克家族的莫大荣幸。总督的指控非常严重，的确需要行商浪人本人的决断。如果您决定进行调查，我愿效犬马之劳。”
languages.original_text: "Kindly allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback offers you an eager bow.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. These charges are grievous indeed and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. Should you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to assist."

traits.locale_text: “也请允许我说几句，大人！”{n}赫特卡·苏尔贝克殷切地鞠了一躬。{/n}“能在您的飞船上工作，是我本人，也是苏尔贝克家族的莫大荣幸。总督的指控骇人听闻，的确需要您的决断。如果您决定进行调查，我愿效犬马之劳。”
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: « Permettez-moi de prendre la parole, Votre Seigneurie »{n}Hetka Sauerback s'incline avec zèle.{/n} « Servir sur votre vaisseau est un grand honneur pour moi et pour ma famille. Ces accusations sont graves et nécessitent toute l'attention {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Je me ferais un plaisir de vous aider si vous deviez décider de mener vous-même une enquête. »
languages.original_text: "Kindly allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback offers you an eager bow.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. These charges are grievous indeed and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. Should you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to assist."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi de prendre la parole, Votre Seigneurie »{n}Hetka Sauerback s'incline avec zèle.{/n} « Servir sur votre vaisseau est un grand honneur pour moi et pour ma famille. Ces accusations sont graves et nécessitent toute l'attention {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Je me ferais un plaisir de vous aider si vous deviez décider de mener vous-même une enquête. »
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: «¡Permítame hablar también, mi{mf|lord|lady}!». {n}Hetka Sauerback se inclina ante ti con entusiasmo.{/n} «Es un gran honor para mí y mi familia poder {mf|servirle|servirla} en su nave. Las acusaciones son graves y requieren de la atención del Comerciante Independiente. Estoy a su disposición si decide llevar a cabo una investigación».
languages.original_text: "Kindly allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback offers you an eager bow.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. These charges are grievous indeed and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. Should you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to assist."

traits.locale_text: «¡Permítame hablar también, mi{mf|lord|lady}!». {n}Hetka Sauerback se inclina ante ti con entusiasmo.{/n} "Es un gran honor para mí y mi familia poder {mf|servirle|servirla} en su nave. Las acusaciones son graves y requieren de la atención del Comerciante Independiente. Estoy a su disposición si decide llevar a cabo una investigación».
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "Gestattet auch mir einige Worte, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback verneigt sich geflissentlich vor dir.{/n} "Die Gelegenheit, auf Eurem Schiff zu dienen, ist eine große Ehre für mich und meine Familie. Die Anschuldigungen sind schwer und erfordern daher die Aufmerksamkeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Solltet Ihr entscheiden, eine Untersuchung durchzuführen, unterstütze ich Euch gerne."
languages.original_text: "Kindly allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback offers you an eager bow.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. These charges are grievous indeed and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. Should you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to assist."

traits.locale_text: "Gestattet auch mir einige Worte, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback verneigt sich eifrig vor dir.{/n} "Die Gelegenheit, auf Eurem Schiff zu dienen, ist eine große Ehre für mich und meine Familie. Die Anschuldigungen sind schwer und erfordern daher die Aufmerksamkeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Solltet Ihr entscheiden, eine Untersuchung durchzuführen, stehe ich gerne zur Verfügung."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "Müsaadenizle ben de konuşayım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!" {n}Hetka Sauerback, narin bir reveransla önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "Geminizde hizmet etme fırsatına sahip olmak, hanem ve benim adıma büyük bir onurdur. Bu ağır ithamlar, Hür Tacir'in ilgisine muhtaçtır. Soruşturma başlatmak isterseniz yardımcı olmaktan mutluluk duyarım."
languages.original_text: "Kindly allow me to speak as well, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}Hetka Sauerback offers you an eager bow.{/n} "The opportunity to serve on your ship is a great honour for me and my family. These charges are grievous indeed and thus require the attention of the Rogue Trader. Should you decide to conduct an investigation, I would be happy to assist."

traits.locale_text: "Müsaadenizle ben de konuşayım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!" {n}Hetka Sauerback, narin bir reveransla önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "Geminizde hizmet etme fırsatına sahip olmak, hanem ve benim adıma büyük bir onurdur. Bu ağır ithamlar Hür Tacir'in ilgisine muhtaçtır. Bir soruşturma başlatmak isterseniz yardımcı olmaktan mutluluk duyarım."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback
